## FontCatalog.getFont() method

Gets the best matched font for a specific character.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFont(codePoint: number, fontName?: string): Font;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  codePoint | number | Character's Unicode code point. |
|  fontName | string | Font name suggestion. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Font](./harp-text-canvas.font.md)

Best matched font.
